loans.use: Additional inventory of fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Estela Del Socorro

texts.es:
Estela es una mujer trabajadora, con su propio negocio, tiene la edad de 39 años, madre de cuatro hijos y vive junto a su esposo quien trabaja como guarda de seguridad.
Inicio hace cinco años con dinero que su esposo dio, y con pequeños préstamos en bancos,  lo que logro aumentar la venta de comida, tortillas, frijoles cocidos.
Hoy en día comienza a invertir más,  trabajando con  Afodenic, siendo sus intereses bajos, lo que comprara mas carne, pollo, granos básicos, verduras, frutas, para aumentar  la variedad de alimento para atraer más clientela, así como maíz para palmear tortillas, leña. Lo que espera obtener mejores ganancias y pagar sus compromisos de pagos
texts.en:
Estela is a hard-working woman with her own business.  She's 39, the mother of four children, and lives with her husband, who works as a security guard.  

She started out five years ago with small bank loans and money from her husband, and managed to grow her food business, which includes tortillas and cooked beans. 

Lately Estela has begun to invest more, working with Afodenic, with its low interest rates.  She'll buy more meat, chicken, basic grains, vegetables, and fruits to expand variety and attract more customers.  She'll also buy corn to make tortillas, and some firewood.  She hopes to bring in better profits so she can pay her debts.

loans.use: She'll buy meat, chicken, basic grains, fruits, vegetables, and other items to continue growing her investment.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy bananas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more goats to sell to her customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Operating capital to maintain her equipment

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy the ingredients she needs to make more soap.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more green bananas to sell to her customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand a small food-selling business

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: El señor Julio Cesar es casado y tiene tres hijos los cuales son menores de edad. El señor Julio se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general. Este negocio lo realiza de manera ambulante por lo que es una forma de tener una gran variedad de clientes,  él está muy feliz con su medio de vida ya que habla con mucha personas. Julio dio inicio a su negocio hace 2 años, cabe señalar que este negocio fue heredado por su familia. El crédito será invertido en la compra de pantalones, camisas, cosméticos, calzado entre otros. Su meta principal es tener suficiente salud para seguir adelante.
texts.en: Julio Cesar is married and has three dependent children.  Julio's business is selling general merchandise.  He makes his sales as a traveling salesman.  This is a good way to have a large variety of customers.  He is very happy with his way of life since he gets to talk to many people.  Julio started his business 2 years ago.  We should point out that he inherited it from his family.  His loan will be invested in buying pants, shirts, cosmetics, shoes and other products.  His main goal is to enjoy good enough health that he can keep moving forward in life.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more items to sell to her customers

loans.name: Fanny Del Socorro

texts.es:
Fanny es una mujer emprendedora, madre de dos hijos, con su propio negocio un cyber en donde ofrece varios servicios de internet, llamadas telefónicas, recargas electrónicas. Con más de seis años, el cual ha venido mejorando tecnología con equipos nuevos con financiamiento que Afodenic ha otorgado en seis ciclos. Lo que está contenta ya que ha logrado apoyar a su familia, equilibrar sus gastos y poder satisfacer sus gastos personales.
Con esta nueva solicitud es  para trasladar de servicios de claro a servicios Yota con un alto nivel avanzado, lo que dará un mejor servicio. En donde comprara varios equipos para esta instalación.
texts.en:
Fanny is an enterprising woman and the mother of two children. She owns her own internet cafe from where she offers a variety of internet services, public telephones, and prepaid cards. She has more than six years in the business and she has improved the technology with new systems with the help of loans accessed through Afodenic (Kiva Field Partner) over the past six loan cycles. She is very happy to have been able to support her family and to be able to balance her expenses and still be able to cover her personal expenses.

This new loan will be used to move from Claro services to Yota services that operate at a much higher level, thereby improving service. She will purchase various systems to install.

loans.use: To purchase new systems for her internet cafe.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To reinvest in her boutique

loans.name: Alenys Meleth

texts.es:
Alenys  B. es  una joven Barranquillera que vive con sus padres y hermano, en un ambiente de mucha unidad familiar, en el barrio Carrizal de Barranquilla, lugar alegre, carnavalero  y  escenario donde se desempeña en su negocio de vender de comidas rápidas, como salchipapas combinación de salchicha con papas fritas en salsas), perros calientes, hamburguesas, jugos naturales y productos   fritos en general.  
En su comunidad  que es de gran tamaño y en los barrios aledaños a ella, todos conocen los alimentos que se preparan en el negocio de Alenys, que surgió después de haberse quedado sin empleo formal, lo cual aprovechó para reactivar un negocio al que no había dado continuidad  su familia,  y que ella y su novio, (con el que pronto contraerá matrimonio), decidieron darse a la tarea de reinaugurarlo y lograr mantenerlo.  Una vez asumió  este riesgo sin estar muy convencida, su negocio empezó a crecer y  ha logrado estabilizarlo,  hasta darse cuenta que puede progresar con él aun mas. El factor de éxito de esta microempresa de alimentos es su persistencia para ir de menos a mas  y lograr haber pasado de vender  uno pocos productos a muchos mas,  adicionándole la refresquería con su producto estrella,  pues los jugos naturales preparados  con frutas tropicales frescas  como mangos, patilla, naranja, mandarina, banano, etc hacen que  esté siempre concurrido por su  clientes, que buscan el deleite gustativo, la higiene y una buena alimentación. Este su Credikiva es su primer financiamiento con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará  en mayor cantidad salsas, grasas, verduras, carnes frías, frutas tropicales y azúcar. Su sueño es ahora lograr una locación muy amplia y confortable para que sus clientes sean siempre los grandes jefes de su negocio.
texts.en:
Alenys B. is a young woman who lives with her parents and brother in a very close family environment in Carrizal neighborhood of Barranquilla.  This is a cheerful, party area and it is where Alenys runs her business selling fast food such as 'salchipapas' (a combination of sausage and French fries in sauce), hot dogs, burgers, natural juices and fried products in general.

In her community, which is large, and in the surrounding neighborhoods, everybody is familiar with the food from Alenys' business.  Her business came about when she found herself without a formal job.  She took advantage of the situation and re-activated a business that her family hadn't kept going.  She and her boyfriend (who she will marry soon) decided to re-establish the business and keep it running.  She took on this risk without being very sure but her business began to grow and she has managed to stabilize it.  She has even realized that she can make more progress in it.

The success factor of this small businesswoman is her persistence in going from less to more.  She has managed to go from selling just a few products to selling many more, adding soft drinks to her line of products.  Alenys prepares natural juices with fresh tropical fruits such as mangos, watermelon, mandarins, bananas, etc.  Her business is always busy with customers seeking a taste delight, good hygiene and good food.

This Kiva loan is Alenys' first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and she will use it to buy a sauces, fats, vegetables, cold cuts, tropical fruit and sugar in larger quantities.    Her dream is to acquire a bigger and more comfortable sales location as her customers are always the great leaders of her business.

loans.use: To buy sauces, fats, vegetables, cold cuts, tropical fruits and sugar in larger quantities

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Reinvest in their business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To reinvest in her business

loans.name: Jenny Elizabeth

texts.es: Jenny Elizabeth se dedica a la repostería y el alquiler de sillas. Por lo que no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos y se siente satisfecha por esta ayuda. Tiene más de 14 años de obtener este medio de vida, ella es una persona trabajadora y la mayoría de sus clientes le solicitan en gran cantidad la repostería sus vecinos, amigos y familiares disfrutan de ellos.   Se levanta temprano todos los días para abrir su local y ofrecer la variedad de productos que ofrece. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de una batidora industria y algunas sillas.
texts.en:
Jenny Elizabeth runs a bakery and rents out chairs. This is not the first time she has had a loan, and she is very pleased about receiving this help. She has earned a living this way for more than 14 years.

Jenny is a hardworking woman, and most of her customers buy large quantities of her baked goods. Her neighbors, friends and relatives all enjoy them. Jenny wakes up early each day to open her shop and offer the variety of products that she sells.

She is asking for the loan to buy an industrial mixer and some chairs.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Juan Rafael

texts.es:
Juan es padre de familia de dos hijos, casado, su esposa trabaja como secretaria, y él es contador desde hace varios años. Como objetivo ha sido la construcción de su casa que ha venido haciendo con ahorros propios.
Hoy en día va a terminar de cerrar el baño y una mejoría a un cuarto, lo que comprara materiales de construcción, para poder comenzar, todo esto gracias a los financiamientos que Afodenic ha dado, en donde ha avanzado más rápido, ya que todo está ah altos costos, y que le es favorable pagar a plazos ya que se equilibra en los gastos.
texts.en:
Juan is the father of two and he is married. His wife works as a secretary and he has been an accountant for many years. His goal has been the construction of a house that he has been building with his own savings. 

He is ready to complete the bathroom and to improve another room. He will purchase construction materials to being and all this is possible thanks to the loans granted through Afodenic (Kiva Field Partner). He has been able to progress more quickly, especially because everything has risen in price. He is ready to make loan payments in order to normalize the expense.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Hired help and purchase of supplies for coffee plantation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy raw material and create a water well.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy gourds and squashes for making more handicraft objects

loans.name: Simona De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Simona es mujer trabajadora, madre de dos hijos, casada, con el apoyo de su esposo.
Su trabajo que realiza desde hace más de veinte años es el lavado y planchado domiciliar, comenzando con necesidad de poder obtener ingresos para apoyar a su familia.
Por medio de financiamiento ha logrado hacer mejora  a su vivienda, lo que para su familia ha sido de mucha satisfacción. Con el crédito anterior comenzó un muro en la parte de enfrente, ahora quiere levantar pared en la parte de alado de su terreno y así pode cerrar toda su propiedad, para mejor cuido de sus hijos. Y que solo por medio de Afodenic lo esta obteniendo.
texts.en:
Simona is a hardworking woman, the mother of two children, and she is married. She has her husband's support. The business she has had over the past twenty years has been private laundry services. She started out when she saw a need to obtain an income to support her family. 

Through the use of loans she has been able to improve her house, a project that has been very satisfactory for her family. With the previous loan she started a front wall and now she wants to build the side wall to her land. She will be closing off the entire property and it will be a benefit to her children's care. And it is only through Afodenic (Kiva Field Partner) that this has been possible.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials to build a wall.

loans.name: Lucia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Lucia madre soltera, mujer trabajadora, dedicada a la educación de sus hijos y mejor el nivel de vida de su familia, tiene como proyecto mejoras la infraestructura de su vivienda. Tiene su propio negocio que es un cafetín desde hace un tiempo, inicio con fondo propios y ahora se ha ido incrementando su inventario mediante el apoyo de la financiera. 
El préstamo que solicitad será invertido para la compra de productos como: gaseosa, caramelos, pan dulce, agua embotellada, elaboración de desayunos, almuerzo, refrescos naturales entre otros para tener una variedad para ofrecer a su diversa clientela.
texts.en:
Lucia is a single mother and a hardworking woman devoted to providing her children with and education and to improve the quality of life for her family. Her project is to improve the infrastructure of their house. She has had her own snack bar for some time. She started out with her own saving sand she has been increasing her inventory through the support of the organization. 

The loan that she requests will be used to purchase products such as: soft drinks, candy, pastries, bottled water, and to prepare breakfasts, and lunches, and to make fresh fruit drinks. She will increase the variety of products to offer to her diverse clientele.

loans.use: To purchase a variety of merchandise.

loans.name: Mariana Lucia

texts.es:
Mariana es una mujer activa, madre de dos hijas, hoy en día sigue laborando en proyectos e organizaciones extranjeras, en programas sociales de familia, abarcando las familias de pocos recursos económicos. Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo, quien labora como ingeniero civil. Es atreves de los financiamientos que comienza hacer mejora  a su casa, en donde ha repellado paredes, embaldosar, compra de lavandero, y ahora con este nuevo préstamo hará la construcción de un muro para reguardar su vivienda, a si como mejor seguridad para su familia.
Materiales a utilizar: piedra, arena, cemento, hierro, piedrín entre otros.
Contenta porque, ha logrado el objetivo de mejorar su casa, pagando  a plazos, lo que se ayuda en su economía.
texts.en:
Mariana is an active woman and the mother of two daughters. Currently she has taken on some projects with international organizations in social programs geared towards the family, especially families of limited financial resources. She has her husband’s support. He works as civil engineer. It is through the loans that she has been able to improve their house, having plastered the walls, add tiling, and to purchase a sink. With this new loan she will build a wall to protect her house and to add greater security to her family. 

Materials that will be used: rocks, sand, cement, steel, gravel and others.

She comments that she has reached her objective of improving their house by making loan payments and this has helped their finances.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To expand her business of making and selling kenkey, a traditional dish made from ground cornmeal

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To expand the kenkey business

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
La señora Lidia B. B. tiene  52 años de edad y vive en una de su propiedad. Vivienda que esta ubicada en el Barrio Andalucia de esta ciudad de Tarija. Lidia es madre soltera de 3 hijos, por circunstancias de la vida por una infidelidad por parte de su pareja se quedo sola ahora ella tiene que trabajar para poder sacar adelante a sus 3 hijos. Lidia se dedica desde hace mas de 23 años a la elaboracion de salteñas y al servicio y atencion de un salon de belleza. Ambas actividades que realiza son muy reconocidas en esta ciudad.  

Su salon de belleza se denomina "noelia" en el cual ya tiene una variada clientela,  Lidia quiere tener mejores ingresos para salir adelante ella junto con sus 3 hijos , pero ella nos cuenta que quiere comprarse mercaderia para tener por un buen tiempo debido a  que los productos que son necesarios estan subiendo de precio. Como ella ya tiene experiencia en el rubro el credito sera destinado para la compra de dicha mercaderia que es nesesario para realizar su actividad para de ese modo poder incrementar sus ingresos.                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Lidia nos cuenta que quiere mejorar las condiciones de vida que tiene, por eso nos dice que el proximo credito que solicite sera para mejora las condiciones de su casa
texts.en:
Lidia B. B. is 52 years old and lives in a house that she owns in the Andalucia neighborhood of the city of Tarija. Lidia is a single mother of three children. Due to life circumstances and her partner's infidelity, she is single and now has to work to be able to get her three children ahead in life. Lidia has worked making ‘salteñas’ (a type of Bolivian baked empanada) and has worked at a beauty salon for more than 23 years. Both of these businesses are well-known in the city.

Her beauty salon is called Noelia and she already has an assorted clientele. Lidia wants to make a better income to get ahead in life with her three children. However, she tells us that she wants to buy merchandise that will last for a while because the items she needs are becoming more expensive. As she already has experience in this area, the loan will be used for the purchase of the merchandise needed to do her job so that she can increase her income.

Lidia tells us that she wants to improve her living conditions. This is why she says that the next loan that she requests will be for improving the condition of her home.

loans.use: Operational capital for her beauty salon

loans.name: Lesbia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Lesbia madre soltera, mujer emprendedora, trabajadora con la misión de que sus hijos sean hombres y mujeres de bien. Tiene su propio negocio una venta de ropa y tiene cosechas de frutas desde hace unos años y lo inicio con los ahorros propios y poco a poco ha ido creciendo con las cantidades y aumentando sus ventas.
Con el préstamo comprara materiales como: cerámica, cemento, arena, ladrillo para embaldosar el suelo de su casa.
Agradece a la financiera por apoyarla al desarrollo de su negocio, obteniendo ganancias para seguir invirtiendo.
texts.en:
Lesbia is a single mother.  She’s an enterprising, hard working woman whose mission is that her children become upstanding citizens.  

She has clothing sales business of her own and also harvests fruit.  She started the business several years ago with funds of her own and gradually has been growing in quantity and increasing sales.

She will use the loan to buy materials like: ceramic tile, cement, sand and bricks to install flooring in her house.

She is grateful to the financial institution for supporting her in her business’ development obtaining profits to continue investing.

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy materials to increase her sewing business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more food items to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more hair products to use when cutting and styling her customers' hair

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more meat and charcoal to sell at market

loans.name: Felix

texts.es:
El cliente tiene 32 Años, vive en el trópico de Cochabamba en la localidad de entre ríos, desde hace 3 años.
El señor Felix,  vino al trópico, de la provincia Charcas del departamento de Potosi, por mayor oportunidad de trabajo, ya que en su comunidad la producción por motivos climaticos,  los productos de la canasta familiar  son cada vez más caros, apenas alcanza para sobrevivir.

Cuando llegó indica, que se vino con unas cuantas ropas y  con poca plata, ahí ayudaba a cargar fruta de temporada a los intermediarios, que comercializaban en  la ciudad de Santa Cruz y Cochabamba, tambien aun sigue trabajando como partidario en otras parcelas. Es una persona bastante dinamica. 

Con el transcurso del tiempo fue  ahorrando poco a poco y fue comprándose un lote agricola y fue plantandose cultivos como ser: platano y cultivos anuales (arroz, yuca), ahora  el cliente solicita el crédito para seguir ampliando su plantacion de platano y de esa manera tener mas ingresos, el cliente desea a futuro comprar un vehiculo para poder transportar ahí su produccion,  de esa manera. No depender mucho de un transporte publico.
texts.en:
This borrower is 32 years old and has lived in the Entre Ríos area of the Tropic of Cochabamba for the past three years.

Felix came to the tropic from the Charcas province in the Department of Potosí for better work opportunities, as the common products in his community are more and more expensive because of the climate and they can barely survive.

He indicates that he had come to the tropic with some clothing and a little money. There, he helped carrying seasonal fruit to the intermediaries who sell it in the cities of Santa Cruz and Cochabamba. He also still continues to work supporting other pieces of land. He is a very dynamic person.

Over time, he saved little by little and bought a piece of farming land and planted crops like bananas and annual crops like rice and yucca. Now he is requesting a loan to continue expanding his banana plantation so that he can make a higher income. In the future, he wants to buy a vehicle to be able to transport his crops and not depend a lot on public transportation.

loans.use: Operational capital for farming

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase seeds, glaze and clay to make her crafts

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more beauty products for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy maize, beans, and charcoal in larger quantities as the cost of transportation keeps increasing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase supplies for children's parties

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more cosmetics to offer for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To restock beauty supplies

loans.name: Ponciano

texts.es:
El señor Ponciano V. O. de 57 años, tiene una hija menor que estudia. Ellos viven en una comunidad que está a 49 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba, el Sr. Ponciano es agricultor produce papa, haba, necesita un capital para comprar abono orgánico el abono en esta época es barato y no tiene todavía ingresos económicos de la producción agrícola.

El sr. Ponciano es una persona humilde trabajador y responsable, para él es muy difícil acudir a los Bancos de la ciudad que les piden muchos requisitos. Se tuvo la iniciativa de ir a esa zona a otorgar crédito, El sr Ponciano se emocionó mucho al saber que tiene la oportunidad de obtener un crédito, con lo que pueda comprar el abono orgánico oportunamente y tener lista para la siembra de esta año, así va tener ahorro para el estudio de la hija, como también para mejorar la vivienda que habitan porque esta es muy precaria.
texts.en:
Mr. Ponciano V. O., 57, has a minor daughter who is in school.  They live in a community located 49 kilometers from the city of Cochabamba.  Ponciano is a potato and lima bean farmer who needs a loan to buy organic manure.  Manure is inexpensive this time of year but his crops haven’t produced income for him yet.

Ponciano is a humble, responsible, hard working person.  It is very difficult for him to go to banks in the city that have lots of requirements.  We took the initiative to go to this area to grant loans.  Ponciano became very excited knowing that he would have the opportunity to obtain a loan with which to buy manure at an opportune time to have ready for this year’s planting season.  He will, thus, have savings available for his daughter’s schooling and also to do some home improvements on their dwelling which is quite precarious.

loans.use: To buy organic manure.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To expand her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase additional bags of maize for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more bags of maize in order to produce her wares in larger quantities for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more bags of Irish potataoes and cassava to offer for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more provisions to restock her shop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To expand her cooking business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more trays of eggs to offer for resale

loans.name: Kutuma

texts.en: Kutuma Y. is a single parent with 3 children. She has been through junior high school and is now a poultry farmer at Korfofordo, near Jukwa. She uses her income to see to the upkeep of her home, and will use this loan to purchase poultry feed to enhance the growth of her chicks so she can sell them for more money. With the new profits from her expanded business, Kutuma plans to reinvest back into her business.

loans.use: to purchase poultry feed

loans.name: Gelgi De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Gelgi trabaja en su casa de habitación en donde su trabajo es la costura, con más de dieciséis años, lo que hacía a medio tiempo ante, ya que laboraba de corredora de seguro.
Para dar más cuido a sus hijos y proyectare mas, decide dar el cien por ciento al trabajo de costura, en donde hace rumbo ligeros, trajes. 
Afodenic ha dado financiamiento en donde ha logrado más la inversión de su negocio, así como otros ingresos que recibe de su hermano el cual trabaja en soldadura en su propiedad.
Con este nuevo préstamo comprara cincuenta yarda de tela, y bordados para hacer vestidos, camisas, pantalones, short. Que espera poder cumplir con sus pedidos.
texts.en:
Gelgi works in her house where she has worked in her tailoring business or more than sixteen years. Previously she worked part time when she was employed as a security guard.  In order to give more attention to her children she decided to dedicate one hundred percent of her time to tailoring, making casual clothing and suits. 

Afodenic has granted her loans to invest in her business. She also receives funds from her brother that works as a welder on his property. 

With this new loan she will purchase fifty yards of fabrics and embroidery to make dresses, shirts, pants, and shorts. She expects to fill the orders that have been placed.

loans.use: To purchase fabrics and embroidery to fill orders that have been placed.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua M. is married and has 4 children. She has been through junior high school, and now sells yam tubers at Korfofordo, near Jukwa in Cape Coast, by moving from one area of the locality to another. She has been in this trade for 3 years. Her husband is a carpenter. Efua uses her income to assist her husband in the education of her children, and will use the loan to purchase more yam tubers to expand her business. (At the time of the visit, she was left with just 2 tubers after her normal rounds.)  With the new profits from her expanded business, Efua plans to provide her children with a meaningful education.

loans.use: to purchase more yam tubers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more bananas, chicken, and maize flour for her restuarant

loans.name: Zandra

texts.es: Zandra D. León C. tiene 37 años y es la propietaria D. un negocio llamado “Papelería Zandra”  ubicado en el barrio El Prado D. la ciudad e Barranquilla, en una importante calle comercial D. este sector; esta iniciativa emprendedora comenzó hace 4 años, cuando compró poca mercancía  que vendió prontamente y con las utilidades obtenidas reinvirtió en nuevas mercancías y la tomó como una buena alternativa para generar ingresos familiares, porque ha ido agregando, servicios D. fotocopiaje y D. telecomunicaciones e internet y también el funcionamiento D. otros negocios mediante franquicia como las D.  D. servicios D. mensajería y D. pagos D. servicios públicos que   en su local funciona y que en la actualidad ha logrado dos nuevos puntos. Este es su quinto financiamiento con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y con este su credikiva, comprará artículos D. papelería, como cuadernos, cartulinas, agendas, bloques D. hojas, marcadores y resaltadores , para con ello augurar una inversión exitosa, porque esta es la época D. mayor venta D.  útiles escolares debido a que los estudiantes regresan a clases. Con los anteriores financiamientos Zandra logró comprar nuevos computadores, con ellos que ha ampliado su servicio D. internet, así mismo los financiamientos le han permitido, diversificar su oferta D. productos y adaptarlos a cada temporada.  Su mayor desafío es la competencia que es fuerte pero ha logrado enfrentarla  exitosamente, porque sus precios son mejores,  lo mismo que  la diversidad D. servicios que entrega al cliente.
texts.en:
Zandra D. León C., 37, owns a business called “Papelería Zandra” located in Barranquilla’s El Prado neighborhood on an important commercial street in this sector.  This enterprising initiative started four years ago when she bought a little merchandise that quickly sold out.  She used profits from this sale to reinvest in new merchandise and took this as a good alternative for generating family income because she’s been gradually adding other services to it like: photocopying services and Internet access.  She also is a franchisee for other businesses like package delivery services and public utility payment services at her store and at two other sales points.

This is her fifth loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and she will use this Kiva loan to buy stationery items like: notebooks, construction paper, agendas, reams of paper, markers and highlighters to insure a successful investment because this is the season of highest sales for school supplies due to the return of students to classes.

Zandra used prior loans to buy new computers to expand her Internet access service.  Loans have also maD. it possible for her to diversify her stock inventory adapting it to each season.  Her greatest challenge is competition, which is fierce, but she’s managed to face it successfully because her prices are better and she offers a wiD. selection of services to her customers.

loans.use: To buy stationery items like: notebooks, construction paper, agendas, reams of paper, markers and highlighters.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more bananas, beef, cassava and rice

loans.name: Artyom

texts.en: Artyom Avdalyan lives in the Shirak region of Armenia, in the city of Gyumri.  He is happily married with two children (a six year old daughter and a ten year old son).  He has been running his own business for the past ten years.  It is located in the center of the city, on a lively street with many entrepreneurs providing a variety of goods.  He believes his hard work has enabled him to be relatively successful.  He would like a loan to purchase additional inventory and expand sales.  He appreciates the flexibility and service of microfinance loans and expects his business income to increase by around thirty percent.  He hopes to expand his business to a second location and renovate the family apartment.  He is a native of Gyumri and proud to live there.

loans.use: to purchase new inventory

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more beauty products for her business.

loans.name: Karine

texts.en: Karine H. lives in the Shirak region of Armenia, in the village of Kamo.  She is a hard-working farmer who has been raising cattle for the past ten years.  With her high school education she has developed a business plan to expand her business and increase the family income.  She would like a loan to purchase additional cattle and expects her net profit to grow by twenty percent.  Karine is also a mother of four children – a twelve year old daughter and three sons (seventeen, twenty and twenty-two years old).  Karine and her husband wish to save enough money to provide their children with down payments on homes. She is content with her life in the village and enjoys being near her relatives.

loans.use: livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more crates of beer and jerry cans of local gin

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María es una pequeña comerciante que ha venido  creciendo en su inversión con créditos que Afodenic ha dado en su trabajo de costura por más de treinta años, en donde junto a su esposo han logrado formar también una pulpería.
Atreves de los años ha captado sus clientes, también hace ropa para vender, hoy en día necesita más tela para poder cubrir la demanda de uniformes, lo que con este nuevo financiamiento será para la elaboración de uniformes y compra de cosméticos para aumentar sus ventas, y seguir apoyando a su familia.
texts.en:
María is a small merchant who has been growing her investment in her 30 year old seamstress with loans that Afodenic has given her.  Together with her husband she’s managed to also open a grocery store.

Through the years she has secured customers.  She also makes clothes to sell.  Today she needs more fabric to cover the demand for uniforms.  This loan, therefore, will be to manufacture uniforms and to buy cosmetics to increase her sales and continue supporting her family.

loans.use: To buy fabric to make uniforms and to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Mnatsakan

texts.en: Mesrop Mrtirosyan is from the village of Tufashen in the Shirak region of Armenia.  He is happily married with two sons (fifteen and twenty years old).  He has been working on the family farm for the past fifteen years.  He is proud of his high school education and considers himself a hard-working person.  He would like to continue supporting his twenty year old son’s university studies.  With a loan to purchase livestock and renovate his barn he is planning to earn additional funds for the family.  In addition to supporting his family Mesrop also provided his relatives with agricultural produce from the farm.  He enjoys his life in Tufashen surrounded by good neighbors and relatives.

loans.use: to purchase barley seeds and livestock

loans.name: Lidia Maria

texts.es:
Lidia casada, su esposo trabaja como guardia de seguridad, sus hijos esta en el colegio, su objetivo es que sus hijos se preparen profesionalmente. Proyecto mejorar la infraestructura de la vivienda, mujer emprendedora inicio su propio negocio de venta de cosméticos, con ahorros propios para obtener un ingreso extra para apoyar al pago de los gastos. 
Planes para el negoció incrementar su inventario con nuevas variedad de productos así aumentar su ventas y ganancia para seguir invirtiéndola.
El crédito es para construir una pared que requiere para obtener seguridad, necesita comprar materiales de construcción: cemento, arena, piedra, bloques, piedra cantera, alambre de amarre, camisa, estribu entre otros materiales.
texts.en:
Lidia is married.  Her husband is employed as a Security Guard.  Her children are in school.  Her objective is that her children learn a profession.  Her project is home improvement.

An enterprising woman, she started her cosmetics sales business with her own savings in order to have extra income to meet household expenses. Her plan for the business is to increase inventory with new varieties of product thus increasing sales and profits to continue investing.

The loan is to build a wall she needs for greater security.  She needs to buy building materials and supplies:  cement, sand, stone, concrete blocks, paving stones, wire, facing and brackets, among others.

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more bunches of bananas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To add on a room to her house.

loans.name: Mesrop

texts.en: Mesrop Mrtirosyan is from the village of Tufashen in the Shirak region of Armenia.  He is happily married with two sons (fifteen and twenty years old).  He has been working on the family farm for the past fifteen years.  He is proud of his high school education and considers himself a hard-working person.  He would like to continue supporting his twenty year old son’s university studies.  With a loan to purchase livestock and renovate his barn he is planning to earn additional funds for the family.  In addition to supporting his family Mesrop also provided his relatives with agricultural produce from the farm.  He enjoys his life in Tufashen surrounded by good neighbors and relatives.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To build a wall around her property.

loans.name: Felicidad

texts.es:
La señora Felicidad López C. tiene 24 años estado civil soltera tiene una 1 hija menor viven en la población de Sacaba, la actividad agrícola realiza en la comunidad de Laraty a 36 km de Sacaba, 

Felicidad se dedica a la agricultura produce papa, haba, arveja y cría ganado vacuno lechero, ella necesita capital para comprar abono orgánico en esta época el abono es barato y ella no tiene todavía ingreso económico de la producción agrícola, Felicidad es una persona humilde trabajadora y responsable, para ella es muy difícil acudir a los Bancos de la ciudad que les piden muchos requisitos. Se tuvo la iniciativa de ir a esa zona a otorgar crédito, 

Felicidad está muy contenta de encontrar una institución que le pueda ayudar con el crédito, porque asi podra comprar el abono orgánico  de manera oportuna y tendrá lista para la siembra de este año, su mayor sueño es tener casa propia. Pero para ello aun deberá seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Felicidad López C. is 24 years old, single, and has one small daughter.  They live in the town of Sacaba.  She does farming in the community of Laraty, 36 km outside of Sacaba.  Felicidad farms to produce potatoes, beans, and peas and also engages in dairy cattle breeding.  She needs a loan to buy organic fertilizer.  At this time, fertilizer is cheap but she doesn't yet have income from agricultural production.

Felicidad is a humble worker and responsible person.  It is very difficult for her to go to the banks in the city because they ask for many requirements.  It took initiative to go to that area to extend her credit.  Felicidad is very happy to find an institution that can help her with credit so that she can buy organic fertilizer in a timely manner and have it ready for planting this year.  Her biggest dream is to have her own home, but for that to happen she must continue working.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more boxes of soap to expand her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Mariama will use the loan to purchase more cereals for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To build a wall.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La Señora Sonia O. T., tiene actualmente 25 años de edad de estado civil soltera, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, tiene dos hijos pequeños, en la actualidad trabaja en la Municipalidad de Tíraque que está ubicada aproximadamente a 65 Km. desde la ciudad de Cochabamba.  

Asimismo también manifiesta ser productora agrícola que por motivos laborales dejo esta actividad la gestión pasada, pero tiene previsto para retomar la actividad este año, porque no puede dejar sus terrenos agrícolas sin producción, razón por la cual solicita el presente crédito para la compra de abono de gallinaza y semilla de papa para la siembra que realizara en sus propios terrenos que están ubicados en la comunidad de C'uchimita - Tíraque; los productos que obtendrá producto de la siembra los comercializara en la feria semanal de Tíraque. Ella desea dar mejores condiciones de vida sus hijos porque la agricultura le genera buenos ingresos cuando se la trabaja bien.
texts.en:
Mrs. Sonia O. T., 25, is single.  She managed to finish elementary school.  She has two young children and is currently employed in the city of Tiraque which is located about 65 kilometers from the city of Cochabamba.

She states that she’s also a farmer but left this occupation due to labor issues last season.  She plans to resume this activity this year, though, because she can’t leave her fields unproductive.  For this reason she’s asking for a loan to buy chicken manure and potato seed for the planting she will undertake on her fields located in the community of C'uchimita-Tiraque.  She will sell whatever products she harvests at Tiraque’s weekly market.  She wants to provide better living conditions for her children because farming, when done well, produces good income.

loans.use: To buy organic manure.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy addional millet to supply to her customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To expand her clothing sales business

loans.name: Salifu

texts.en:
For the past six years, Salifu H. has run a business preparing millet porridge to offer for sale at Akaa Kkrom near Abura. Her loan will be used to buy more bags of millet to store for future use, as prices of goods keep increasing. She hopes eventually to use the new profits from her business to buy a piece of land. 

She is unmarried and has one child. As the sole breadwinner of the home, she provides for the needs of the family. 

Salifu is shown in the picture with the millet she uses to make her porridge.

loans.use: To buy more bags of millet to store for future use, as prices of goods keep increasing

loans.name: Ayishietu

texts.en:
Ayishietu O. is married and has five dependents. Ayishietu sells charcoal in both smaller and larger quantities at Akaa kkrom near Abura. Her husband is a cleaner. Ayishietu uses her income to assist her husband in the general upkeep of the home. 

Ayishietu will use the loan to purchase bags of charcoal to expand her business. She anticipates reinvesting the additional income into the business.

loans.use: To purchase bags of charcoal to expand her business

loans.name: Fati

texts.en: For the past five years, Fati A. has sold clothing and cosmetics at Akaa Krom near Abura. She is married and has one child. She and her husband, who is a carpenter, combine their incomes to support their small family and pay for their child's education. She will add the funds from this loan to her capital in order to expand her business. She plans to reinvest her new profit.

loans.use: To add to her capital to expand her cosmetics sales business

loans.name: Ekua Grace

texts.en:
Ekua Grace O. cooks rice, beans and fried plantains for sale at Akaa krom near Abura. Ekua has received a senior high education. She is married and has four children. Her husband is a cleaner. Ekua has been cooking food for sale for four years. Her income is added to that of her husband to take care of the home. 

Her loan will be used to buy more food items to cook to expand her business. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to educate her children.

loans.use: To buy more food items to cook to expand her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Construction of a room

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase of raw materials.

loans.name: Viviana

texts.es: Viviana Martínez es una gran comerciante de muchos productos,  usted la puede encontrarla vendiendo desde cosméticos, pasando por carnes fría hasta  refrescos y útiles de higiene y de aseo personal. Su inspiración emprendedora fue porque sintió la necesidad de generar ingresos al hogar  y cuando no conseguía trabajo como empleada  formal, decidió vender mercancías  y le ha ido tan bien, que todas sus expectativas están asociadas al crecimiento de su negocio, para conseguir en compañía de su esposo  sacar adelante a sus cinco hijos,  que están en las edades de 5 a 22 años de edad. Con su credikiva, que es su primer financiamiento con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo comprará colonias, champús desodorante y talcos, con ello planea lograr incrementar su capital de trabajo responder a perdidos realizados por sus clientes y seguir cosechando compradores que se conviertan en sus fieles clientes. Su gran desafío es tener algún día un local propio y terminar el condicionamiento de su vivienda, para lograr una mejor imagen y exhibición de sus productos.
texts.en:
Viviana Martínez is a great merchant of many products.  She can be found selling from cosmetics, through cold cuts, to beverages and personal hygiene and personal cleaning supplies.  Her enterprising inspiration came when she needed to generate family income and couldn’t find formal employment.  She decided to sell merchandise and has done well.  All of her expectations are associated with the growth of her business so that together with her husband she can support her five children whose ages range from 5 to 22 years.

She will use her Kiva loan, which is her first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to buy colognes, shampoos, deodorants and talc.  She plans thereby to increase working capital to meet pending customer orders and continue acquiring buyers who will become regular customers.  Her great challenge is to someday have a locale of her own and to finish furnishing her home to attain a better image and exposure of her products.

loans.use: To buy colognes, shampoos, deodorants and talcs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy pots and clay piggybanks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Construction of a fence

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy bags of fertilizer and alfalfa and oat seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Expansion and finishes to the exterior of his house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: For rice, oil and detergent.

loans.name: Zoila Maria

texts.es:
Zoila M. empezó su negocio porque  necesitaba otro ingreso para su familia su tipo de negocio es el comercio es decir una tienda en donde vende viveres y articulos. Tambien vende panes. Trabaja con su hijo que la ayuda desde las 10:30 comienza amasar la harina y deja listos los panes solo para meterlos al horno.

Unas de sus dificultades es que sufre la presión. Está casada y su esposo trabaja como chofer y tienen 2 hijos de (22, 16). Unas de sus metas es hacer el segundo piso de su casa para que sus hijos tengan un lugar mas amplio en donde vivir. Pero por ahora quiere comprar con el prestamo bebidas para su negocio.
texts.en:
Zoila M. started her business because she needed another source of income for her family. She has a store where she sells supplies and goods, as well as breads. She works with her son who helps her starting at 10:30am. She begins to knead the dough and leaves the breads ready to put in the oven.

One of her difficulties is the pressure. She is married and her husband works as a driver. They have two children who are 22 and 16 years old. One of her goals is to build a second floor to their house so that their children have a larger space to live. For now, she wants the loan to buy drinks for her business.

loans.use: Drinks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase of tools for work

loans.name: Janine Marilu

texts.es:
Janine de 23 años trabajo desde pequeña con su madre ayudándola a coser y a vender comida.  Ahora vende afuera de su casa comida y también dedica tiempo para realizar labores de costura.

Unas de sus  dificultades son las calles ya que recién están terminadas y también la delincuencia. Tiene 2 hijos  menores de edad y son gemelos tienen 2 años y 6 meses no estudian todavía. 

Janine tiene el sueño de tener un negocio que le pueda dar estabilidad económica ya que sus hijos cuando crezcan demandaran más gastos y tener su propia casa. Pero por ahora quiere comprar con el prestamo telas, hilos para seguir con su negocio.
texts.en:
Janine is 23 years old and has worked with her mother since she was little, helping her to sew and sell food. She now sells food outside of her house and also spends time doing sewing work.

One of the difficulties is the streets because they were recently finished, as well as the delinquency. She has two young twins who are 2 years and 6 months old. They do not go to school yet.

Janine dreams of having a business that can provide her with her own house and financial stability, as her children will incur more expenses as they get older. For now, she wants the loan to buy fabrics and thread to continue with her business.

loans.use: Fabrics, thread

loans.name: Elsa Beatriz

texts.es:
Elsa García E. residente en una urbanización muy cerca  al mar,  donde la playa, la brisa el sol y la alegría son las características de este ambiente, en el cual se desenvuelve su  negocio de preparación de fritos y pasteles de pollo, carne, y queso, con el que  hace 11 años viene trabajando, para lograr el sostenimiento de sus dos hijos en las edades de 16 y 18 años.  Ella inicio su idea emprendedora en su casa, vendiendo fritos solamente y gradualmente se fue trasladando para tiendas vecinas a quienes le da un dinero diario por concepto de alquiler. Su hija mayor trabaja con ella especialmente en las ventas y con ellas ha salido adelante con su negocio,  pues ha logrado tener su casa propia y aun todos los días se esfuerza por aumentar su bienestar familiar, por eso necesita mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales y justamente ese es su gran desafío, porque requiere capital con el que en la actualidad no cuenta, para este propósito.
En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer financiamiento con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y su primer credikiva, con el comprará insumos al por mayor, como aceites, arroz, y azúcar principalmente,  pues  son los que mas aumentan de precio constantemente. Así mismo comprará una estufa industrial, una mesa y enseres para   aumentar la efectividad  de su inversión, pero sobre todo para que   luzca con una imagen de calidad y esta condición atraiga muchos mas clientes.
texts.en:
Elsa García E. lives in a housing development that is very close to the sea.  The beach, the breeze, the sun, and happiness are the characteristics of this environment.  This is where she conducts her business of making fried food and chicken, meat, and cheese pies.  She has been working this way for 11 years in order to manage to support her two children.  The children are 16 and 18 years old.  

She started her enterprising idea in her house.  She only sold fried foods, but she was gradually moving to neighborhood stores.  She gives them money daily to rent.  Her oldest daughter works with her, especially in sales.  With the sales she has gotten ahead in her business.  She has managed to have her own house.  Even so, she works hard every day to increase the well-being of her family.  To do so she needs to improve her housing conditions.  That is her great challenge because she needs capital that she does not now have for this purpose.

She is currently applying for her first loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and her first loan with Kiva.  She will use the loan to buy wholesale supplies like oil, rice, and sugar mostly.  These are the supplies whose prices increase constantly.  She will also buy an industrial stove, a table, and utensils to increase the effectiveness of her investment.  She will do this, above all, so that her business has an image of quality.  This will attract many more customers

loans.use: To buy wholesale supplies like oil, rice, and sugar mostly

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy raw material to make her handicrafts

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.es:
Vicenta de 52  años comenzó con su negocio de comidas hace más de 10 años ya que se vio obligada a trabajar porque tenía que mantener a sus hijos y seguir adelante.

Su trabajo lo hace sola tiene un pequeño horno en el cual asa  y en su cocina prepara los almuerzos los cuales entrega
Ella tiene que trabajar duro y la delincuencia del sector hace a veces que su trabajo se dificulte. 

En la actualidad no convive con nadie y vive con sus hijos que son mayores de edad y son tres de los cuales trabajan. Con el préstamo va a comprar pollos, carnes, legumbres y platos. Unas de sus metas es que su sector mejore y poner su negocio con local para que la gente compre allí mismo y que sus hijos terminen su carrera
texts.en:
Vicenta, 52, started her meals business over 10 years ago because she had to work to support her children and get ahead.

She works alone.  She has a small oven in which she roasts and she prepares meals in her kitchen to deliver.  She has to work hard and lawlessness in the sector makes her work difficult sometimes.

She’s not currently in a relationship.  She lives with her adult children, three of whom work.  She will use the loan to buy chickens, meats, vegetables and plates.  One of her goals is that her sector improves and she can install a locale so people can come by there to buy and another is that her children finish their careers.

loans.use: For rice, meats, vegetables.

loans.name: Luis Miguel

texts.es:
Luis U. de 20 años es un joven emprendedor el cual desde pequeño ayuda a su madre con su negocio y ahora alquila una tricimoto en el cual va a seguir trabajando con una nueva línea de entrega en tricimoto de leche y soya.

Unas de sus dificultades es el afalto de las calles de su sector el cual ha impedido un poco el buen desempeño  de sus labores. Con el préstamo quiere darle mantenimiento a su moto y va a comprar productos de soya para vender.
texts.en:
Luis U., age 20, is a young entreprenuer.  He has been helping his mother with her business since he was little.  He now rents a “tricimoto” (three wheeled motorized vehicle).   He will continue working with his tricimoto in the new line of delivering milk and soy.

One of the difficulties is the asphalt on the streets in his sector has impeded a bit the good performance of his work.  He wants to use the loan to provide maintenance on his motorbike.  He will also buy soy products to sell.

loans.use: Maintenance on his motorbike and soy milk

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more fertilizer for her rice crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To complete the finishings on the outside of her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy school supplies, stuffed toys and notions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase an embroidery machine

loans.name: Norma Del Socorro

texts.es:
Norma madre soltera, tiene a su hijo menor estudiando, su anhelo que se superen los hijos. Mejorar su casa es un proyecto que de mano con la financiera se hará realidad, anteriormente vendía carne de porcino por ser un trabajo pesado cambio a vender ropa de caballero, damas, niños entre otros productos. Lo inicio con la ganancia obtenida del negocio anterior.
Con el préstamo comprara materiales de construcción como: cemento, arena, piedra cantera, piedrín, hierro para construir el frente de la casa, así tendrá seguridad y protección para su familia.
texts.en:
Norma is a single mother; she has a minor son who is in school.  Her dream is that her children improve themselves.  A home improvement is a project that hand in hand with the financial institution will become a reality.  

She used to sell pork but because it was heavy labor she decided to sell men’s, women’s and children’s clothing, among other products.  She started the business with profits from the previous business.

She will use the loan to buy building materials and supplies like: cement, sand, paving stones, gravel and iron rods to build the front of her house thus having security and protection for her family.

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Laura Elena

texts.es:
Doña Laura, tiene 66 años D. edad, resiD. en Chilanga departamento D. Morazán, venD. medicina natural, vive con su esposo, tienen casa propia, doña Laura tiene muchos años D. dedicarse al negocio, su esposo es agricultor cultiva maíz y comercializa la cosecha con los vecinos del lugar.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. madera y pago D. mano D. obra, para reparar el techo D. su casa, este préstamo le ayudara a dar mantenimiento a la vivienda y que estén en un lugar más seguro.
Su objetivo es seguir trabajando para ayudar a su esposo y juntos poder ver por sus necesidades.
texts.en:
Laura, 66, lives in Chilanga, Morazán department.  She lives with her husband in their own house.  She sells natural medicine.  She’s been in business for many years.  Her husband is a corn farmer and he sells his crops to local neighbors.

She is asking for a loan to buy lumber and to pay labor costs to repair her roof.  The loan will help her proviD. maintenance to her house so that they will be in a safer place.  Her goal is to continue working to help her husband so that together they can see to their needs.

loans.use: To buy lumber and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Gregorio Arsenio

texts.es:
Gregorio albañil su compañera trabaja como domestica, sus hijos menores de edad estudiantes, que sus hijos se preparen es su objetivo y meta para ellos.  Familia humilde, trabajadora que requieren mejorar su vivienda para mayor seguridad.
El préstamo que solicitad será invertido en la compra de materiales de construcción: cemento, arena, piedrín, piedras cantera, hierro, camisa, alambre de amarre y otros materiales para la construcción de la pared lateral de la casa. Obteniendo una mejor condición de vida y protección de los robos que sedan en el sector donde viven.
texts.en:
Gregorio is a bricklayer and his spouse works as a domestic employee.  His minor children are school age.  His goal and objective for them is that they prepare themselves.  They are a humble, hard working family that needs to improve their dwelling for greater security.

The loan he’s asking for will be used to buy building materials and supplies like: cement, sand, gravel, paving stones, iron rods, facing, wire and other materials to build a side wall for the house which will lead to better living conditions and protection from break-ins that are common where they live.

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies to build a wall.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: For Tourist Guide equipment.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: For vehicle maintenance and repair.

loans.name: Liseth

texts.es:
La señorita Liseth V. tiene 22 años de edad, es soltera vive en la zona de Quintanilla Municipio de Sacaba en  la casa de sus padres haciéndoles compañía, ella espera tener hijos cuando cuente con una casa propia. Liseth es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora, vende papa de buena calidad junto a su querida mamá en el mercado triangular que está ubicado entre la Av. Aroma y la calle 16 de julio de la ciudad de Cochabamba. 
Liseth quiere el préstamo para que complete el pago que debe al vendedor del vehículo que compro y que lo hace trabajar como taxi para el transporte de pasajeros. Liseth está muy agradecida con la gente que por medio de Kiva que le podra dar la oportunidad de contar con un medio más  para mejorar su nivel de vida y así pueda apoyar mucho más  a su familia.

Liseth entre sus planes futuros planea sacar un nuevo préstamo para poder acceder a una vivienda propia y así realice sus planes de tener muchos hijos.
texts.en:
Liseth V. is 22 years old.  She is single, and lives with her parents in the Quintanilla neighborhood of the municipality of Sacaba.  She hopes to have her own children when she has her own house.  Liseth  is a very responsible and hardworking person who has a business selling good quality potatoes alongside her beloved mother in the Triangular market, which is located between Avenue Aroma and the street "16 de Julio" in the city of Cochabamba.  Liseth wants a loan so that she can pay off her existing vehicle loan.  She bought this vehicle to use as a taxi to transport passengers.  Liseth is very grateful to the people who, through Kiva, are able to give her this opportunity so that she can improve her standard of living and also be a much greater help to her family.

In the future, Liseth plans to take another loan so that she can have her own home, and in this way carry out her plan to have a lot of children.

loans.use: to pay off a vehicle loan

loans.name: Rosales Group

texts.es: La Señora Mirian R. tiene 44 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos, de los cuales una hija ya está casada, de modo que sólo depende de ella su hijo de 15 años. La señora Mirian lleva 5 años dedicandose a la venta de ropa y ahora desea invertir también en cosméticos, comenta que los créditos le han ayudado mucho ya que con ellos ha sacado adelante a sus hijos siendo madre soltera, dado que gracias a que su negocio es trabajo independiente, no descuida su hogar ya que sus ventas son en su localidad y se dedica sólo las tardes a vender. Miriam se siente muy contenta pues también puede cuidar de sus papás ya que vive con ellos y el no tener un horario de trabajo de todo el dia, le permite tener tiempo para su familia. Observaciones:las integrantes que no se alcanzan a ver del todo bien en la fotografía son las Sras: Julia Muñoz A., Clara B. Hernández  e Isabel T. M. (orden de izquierda a derecha, quedaron mal colocadas al momento de tomar la foto.
texts.en: Sra. Mirian R., 44, is a single mother with 2 children.  Her daughter is married and lives apart, but her 15-year old son still lives at home.  Sra. Mirian has operated a business selling clothing for 5 years and now she wants to sell cosmetics, as well.  She says that past loans have helped her tremendously because she's used the money to build a business that has allowed her--though a single mother--to support her family.  She likes owning her own business because she can work when she wants, in the neighborhood, and be close by to take care of her family.  In addition to her son, Sra. Mirian cares for her parents so it's doubly important that she be able to work nearby and still have time for family matters.  Notice: the members who aren't clearly visible in the photograph are (from left to right, out of plain sight) Sra. Julia Munoz A., Sra. Clara B. H. and Sra. Isabel T. M..

loans.use: Clothing and cosmetics sales.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy merchandise for his business.

loans.name: Anesbelia

texts.es:
Anesbelia casada, su esposo trabaja como inspector en una empresa privada, sus dos hijos estudian en la primaria. Mejora la infraestructura de su humilde vivienda está dentro de los proyectos a corto plazo que se realizaran. Inicio su propio negocio de ventas de recargas, gaseosas, refresco, hielos y helados. Para obtener un ingreso extra y ayudarse con algunos gastos del hogar.
Lo inicio con fondo propios siendo una dificulta ya que requería de mayor inversión para obtener la ganancia necesaria para mantener e invertir. Con el préstamo comprara mercadería como: golosinas, gaseosa, frutas y cereales para elaborar sus helados, bolsas plásticas, recargas telefónicas entre otros productos.
Agradece a la financiera por su oportunidad de creer con su pequeño negocio.
texts.en:
Anesbelia is married and her husband works as an inspector at a private business. Their two children attend primary school. One of the projects they hope to accomplish in the short run is to improve the infrastructure of their humble home.

In order to earn extra income and help with household expenses, she started her own business selling cell phone credits, soft drinks, sodas, popsicles, and ice cream. She started it with her own money, but is experiencing some difficulty because she needs more of an investment in order to maintain her business. She will use this loan to buy merchandise like: candies, soft drinks, fruit and cereals to make frozen desserts, plastic bags, cell phone credits, and other products.

Anesbelia is grateful for this financing because it will provide her with an opportunity to grow with her small business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: For building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sacks of organic fertilizer, seeds, and chemical fertilizers

loans.name: Frank

texts.en: Frank L. owns Business Startups, LLC, whose mission statement is "to enhance the skills of entrepreneurs with tools and expertise for success." Business Startups helps entrepreneurs with setting up an accounting system, website design, and business formation (for corporations and LLCs). As an attorney, Frank has 25 years of legal and accounting experience, and has extensive experience working with for-profit and social entrepreneurs. Located in El Paso, Frank opened Business Startups this past January, 2011. His biggest challenge at the moment is marketing. Frank has an assistant who helps with managing the workload. Like Frank, his assistant works with clients by helping them prepare for small business ownership. Aside from Frank and his assistant, Business Startups hires an independent contractor to help clients design their businesses’ web pages. Frank is using this loan to help handle the initial cost of his assistant as well as other smaller operating costs. He says that even though the loan was small, "it took me over a hump and enabled me to launch my business with a more complete website, an employee and a strong infrastructure." Without this loan, Frank says getting Business Startups on its feet would have been more difficult. ACCION Texas-Louisiana was Frank’s first choice for taking out a loan, and is the first loan he has taken out for his business. "I have known about ACCION for many years. I believe in its philosophy and the concept of micro loans. I also know many people at ACCION. It is a great organization with great people." Mr. L.’s advice to other small business owners is, "… dream big, plan carefully, be persistent, work hard and have faith." On his website, he gives free advice and examples of essential things to consider when starting a business. This helps entrepreneurs understand the preparation needed for starting a business, and how Business Startups can help meet those needs with expert advice and planning. Check out the Business Startups, LLC website at www.bsups.com.

loans.use: To hire an employee to increase business capacity

loans.name: Prod Natura (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Prod Natura esta formado por seis mujeres y un hombre quienes laboran en la venta de productos naturales de la marca TIENS, actividad que les está permitiendo mejorar económicamente y a salir adelante con  sus familias, viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es la tercera ciudad más importante del país, es de clima frió y su gente mantienen su cultura y tradiciones.  

La Señora. María Luz Vizñay vive por la parroquia del Valle, tiene 59 años, es viuda y tiene  5 hijos de 29, 26, 23, 21 y 18 años de edad, sus primeros 4 hijos trabajan y le apoyan económicamente, su ultima hija le ayuda en los quehaceres de su hogar. Con su sacrificio ha logrado construir su casa propia.
Doña María Luz se dedica a la venta de productos Naturales actividad que la realiza hace 3 años, vende sin horarios de lunes a sábados. En su casa se dedica a la cría de chanchos, gallinas, cuyes y ganado. 
Se encuentra en el banco comunal hace un año y los créditos anteriores le han beneficiado para el crecimiento de su negocio, su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra productos naturales. Su meta es crecer mucho más en su negocio de venta de productos naturales.

La Señora. Fanny María H. vive por el sector de Totoracocha, se encuentra en su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y fue invitada por una amiga. Tiene 53 años,  es casada y tiene 5 hijos de 34, 32, 29, 28 y 26 años de edad, su primera hija es soltera, trabaja y le ayuda económicamente, su segundo y tercer hijo son casados e independientes, sus dos últimos hijos estudian en la universidad y trabajan. Su esposo es operador de equipo camionero.
Doña Fanny María hace 3 años se dedica a la venta de productos naturales de la marca TIENS, trabaja de lunes a sábados sin un horario fijo.
El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de productos naturales. Su meta es llegar a ser una líder de en la venta de este producto.
texts.en:
The “Prod Natura” communal bank is composed of six women and one man who work selling TIENS brand natural products, an activity that makes it possible for them to improve economically and get ahead with their families.  They live in various parts of the city of Cuenca, the third most important city in the country; it has a cold climate and its residents keep their culture and traditions.

Mrs. María Luz Vizñay lives in Valle parish.  She’s 59 years old, widowed and has five children who are 29, 26, 23, 21 and 18 years of age.  Her oldest four children are employed and help her out economically.  Her youngest daughter helps out with housework.  She has managed to build her own house with her sacrifice.

María Luz sells natural products; she’s been in this line of work for 3 years.  Se sells from Monday through Saturday with no set work schedule.  She also raises pigs, chickens, guinea pigs and livestock at home.

She’s been in the communal bank for a year and the prior loans have helped her business grow.  She’ll use the new loan to buy natural products.  Her goal is to grow much more in her business selling natural products.

Mrs. Fanny María H. lives in Totoracocha.  This is her first loan with the communal bank; she was invited by a girl friend.  She is 53 years old, married and has five children who are 34, 32, 29, 28 and 26 years of age.  Her oldest daughter is single, employed and helps out economically.  Her second and third sons are married and independent.  Her youngest two children are going to the university and also work.  Her husband operates trucking equipment.

Fanny María has been selling TIENS brand natural products for three years.  She works Monday through Saturday with no fixed work schedule.  She will use the loan to buy natural products.  Her goal is to become a lead seller of this product.
